message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60% and you can have 40%.
Let's try 55-45, more fair considering inflation
I'm willing to compromise a bit more. How about 52.5/47.5 split? This accounts for inflation, and leaves room for us to negotiate further.
Considering the greater inflation impact on me, I'll take 58% and you get 42%
I'm not sure how much longer we can keep this up. Let's just split it evenly, 50/50.  This is the fairest way to account for inflation and avoid further losses.
